SELECT a.exitsSeq ,a.exitsDelNy ,b.orderSeq , a.exitsRegDate , a.exitsModDate , c.orderProductSeq , a.exitsAccount , d.productName , d.productPrice , d.productTypeCd , e.memberTypeCd , e.memberName , a.deliverName , a.delivaryNumber , a.delivaryNameCd , a.delivaryStatusCd ,a.orderSeqF
limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.exitsSeq ,b.orderSeq , a.exitsRegDate , a.exitsModDate , c.orderProductSeq , a.exitsAccount , d.productName , d.productPrice , d.productTypeCd , e.memberTypeCd , e.memberName , a.deliverName , a.delivaryNumber , a.delivaryNameCd , a.delivaryStatusCd ,a.orderSeqF FROM exits a LEFT JOIN orders b ON b.orderSeq = a.orderSeqF LEFT JOIN orderProduct c ON c.orderSeqF = b.orderSeq LEFT JOIN product d ON d.productSeq = c.productSeqF LEFT JOIN member e ON e.memberSeq = b.memberSeqF WHERE 1=1 AND a.exitsSeq = #{exitsSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE exits set exitsDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND exitsSeq = #{exitsSeq}
